sentence.Network_en: Use: Test, measuring, lineation, equipment installation and construction of industrial engineering.
sentence.Network_cn: 用途: 检验 、 测量 、 划线 、 设备安装、工业工程的施工.

sentence.Network_en: On the surface of foliation there develops strong stretching lineation defined by alignment of elongated minerals.
sentence.Network_cn: 在片理面上发育有强烈的拉伸线理,这些线理则是由拉长的矿物定向展布而显示.

sentence.Network_en: Passing through analysing of the original lineation method, finding out that it unsuited to the reasonableness.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过对原划线方法的认真分析, 找到其不合理性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 徐亚军地球科学学院线理的概念线理(lineation):岩石中广泛发育的一种多具有透入性的线状构造。 如果线理是非透入性的而只是在某些表面出现,则称为表面线理(.

...linear spectrum　线性光谱：衍射光栅式分光镜产生的光谱，所有波长是等间隔的lineation　线条，轮廓，画线liner　衬砌，炉衬，轴瓦，内衬

【构造线条】structural lineation岩石中朝一定方向伸延的线状构造形象和痕迹。包括原生线条(primary lineation)，如岩浆岩中的流线和次生线条(secondary lineation)，如砾石被压扁所形成的定向构造.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin lineatio(n-), from lineare 'make straight'

means.word_mean: 1. the line that appears to bound an object
2. the act of marking or outlining with lines
